trait.name: Brave
entries: The ashen knight has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Ashen Creature
entries: When the ashen knight drops to 0 hit points, it is reduced to a pile of ash, and any equipment it was wearing or carrying falls to the ground.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ashen knight makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage.

action.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the ashen knight can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a {@dice d4} to its roll provided it can hear and understand the ashen knight. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the ashen knight is {@condition incapacitated}.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The ashen knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the ashen knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
